entry.title: LeetCode-Add Two Numbers
entry.content: 本文介绍LeetCode-Add Two Numbers的解题思路和代码 原题You are given two linked lists representing two non-negative numbers. The digits are stored in reverse order and each of their nodes contain a single digit. Add the two numbers and return it as a linked list.

entry.title: LeetCode解题报告--TWO SUM
entry.content: 本文介绍LeetCode-TWO SUM的解题思路和代码 原题Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution. 给定一个整形数组，数组中两个数的和为指定的值，返回这两个数的索引，假设每个输入都有正确的解 原题链接 Example:12345Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9,Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9,return [0, 1]. 解题思路通常的思路是两层for循环实现，这种方法耗时太多，时间复杂度为O(N^2)这里利用map来实现，每次循环数组时，查看map中有没有当前索引对应的值，没有则将目标值-当前值作为key，索引作为value插入到数组中如果找到，则当前索引和map查找的值即为结果。时间复杂度为O(N)。 C++代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223class Solution {public: vector<int> twoSum(vector<int>& nums, int target) { unordered_map <int,int> m; vector<int> result; for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++) { if(m.find(nums[i])==m.end()) { m[target-nums[i]] = i; } else { result.push_back(m[nums[i]]); result.push_back(i); break; } } return result; }}; python代码12345678910111213class Solution(object): def twoSum(self, nums, target): """ :type nums: List[int] :type target: int :rtype: List[int] """ map={} for i in xrange(len(nums)): x = nums[i] if x in map: return (map[x],i) map[target-x] = i

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
